titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization of the Highlands Conservation Act.
A bill to extend the authorization of the Highlands Conservation Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Highlands Conservation Act to reauthorize through FY2021: (1) land conservation partnership projects in the highlands regions of Connecticut, New Jersey, New York, and Pennsylvania; and (2) Forest Service and Department of Agriculture programs to assist states, units of local government, and private forest and farm landowners in the conservation of land and natural resources in that region.
